entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing "appxrecipe" Maui Won't Deploy #22842
  • OOTB MSIX packaging fails to include Windows SDK #22838
  • Label HtmlText should support sub and sup #22837
  • [IOS][WEBVIEW] Unable to run an iframe in a webview #22833
  • [Android] Images not appearing initially #22827
  • Programmatic name for (+) increase reating/(-)Decrease rating button is not descriptive: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_Devtools #22826
    .NET 8 SR8
  • VS 2022, emulated device, Debug vs Release #22825
  • [Bug] The NavigationBar fails to refresh when the existing child of a TabbedPage is substituted with a different NavigationPage. #22824
  • When keyboard focus is on "Korean egg roll" recipe of my recipe list and press ENETR/SPACE key recipe is not opening: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes_My Recipes_Keyboard #22823
    .NET 8 SR8
  • When keyboard focus is on review slider, and we press TAB key keyboard focus is not visible: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_NewRecipe_FocusOrder #22822
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Maui Blazor app freezes after pressing back button on Android. #22819
  • [Blazor] BlazorWebView and friends need a finalizer and probably also to implement IDisposable and block #22818
  • [ios] ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected (clicked event handler used) #22814
    Backlog

Closed

  • Flyout doesn't load the page after navigating back #19955
    .NET 8 SR6
  • PlatformBehavior.OnAttachedTo() is called twice during adding behaviour to a control causing a memory leak #22740
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Use `.windows.cs` instead of `.uwp.cs` in Essentials #22831
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #22828
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Errors Restoring NuGet Packages, accessing Nuget and VS Marketplace once a MAUI Project was added. #22817
  • Missing Package Source Mapping in NuGet.config #15719
    Backlog
  • MudBlazor Dialog does not works in Maui Blazor. #22343
  • [Android][Handler/Layout Engine] Custom Entry with TextInputLayout won't respect layout width #21150
  • Support DisplayAlert from PresentedViewController #14258
    Backlog
  • MaskedBehavior from the Toolkit Behaviors is not working properly #22041
  • Sometimes .ttf files are missing in the application after the apk or aab build #22806
  • (iOS) Entrys ignoring textColor-property if text-property set via binding #22025
  • Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22811

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22841
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22840
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-testing, testing-reenable
  • Update project & solution templates #22816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-templates
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Update versions for preview5 #22829
    area-infrastructure
  • [tests] fix F5 for Windows device tests #22835
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • Reset opacity when view is being reused #22820
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Fixing _loaded event firing logic #22807
    area-core-lifecycle, community ✨
  • [XC] Respects GenerateFullPaths #22808
  • Increase MAUI library supported version to 13.0 #22794
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • Added some additional testing assets to sandbox #22821
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [workload] fix missing files during the build #22804
  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf
  • Make sure the package source mapping is correct #22788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area-templates, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton selection in Group #22787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [ios/catalyst] fix leak in NavigationPage #22810
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml
  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixes endless loop of HorizontalScroll #22628
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS - Fix #22655
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, potential-regression
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
